metadata.synopsis: ShadowHeart reacting on reading"Selune Prayer Book"Location: SCL -> Tollhouse - Seized Inventory Room.She reacts both when she reads the book or when another character does that.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Read "Selune Prayer Book"Location: SCL -> Tollhouse - Seized Inventory Room.ONLY triggers if you read the book before picking it up.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Rambling nonsense. Why someone would be drawn to this is beyond me.

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: I'm sure there's better things you could find to read.

2.speaker: Shadowheart
2.text: Moonlight, guidance, tides... how fascinating. Consider me converted, Selûne.
2.context: NodeContext: Sarcastic. Stiffles a mock yawn just before 'how fascinating'. seh-LOON-eh

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.text: I didn't realise we had time to read childrens' stories.
